Method Detail

isInitialized

public static Boolean isInitialized()
Is configuration initialized (has been loaded at least once).

Returns:
True if configuration has been loaded once, false otherwise.

read

public static void read(String e)
Read configuration on disk for given environment. Conf file will be read even if Configuration has already been initialized.

Parameters:
e - Environment ("local", "dev", "staging", "prod")

read

public static void read()
Read configuration on disk for local environment, only if configuration has not been initialized.
